chess.logic.movementlogic

Class MovementLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • chess.logic.movementlogic.MovementLogic

  • public class MovementLogic
extends Object
    This class is responsible for movement related logic. Class offers methods to get possible moves and threatened squares of a Piece or Player on ChessBoard given as parameter. Also offers method to move piece to target location on chessboard.
    Author:
    sami

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MovementLogic()
      Creates a new MovementLogic initializing mover-objects for each chess piece-class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void move(Piece piece, Square target, ChessBoard board)
      Uses corresponding PieceMover to move given piece to target square on given board.
      Set<Square> possibleMoves(Piece piece, ChessBoard board)
      Uses corresponding mover to returns a set containing all squares given piece can move to on given board.
      Set<Square> possibleMovesByPlayer(Player player, ChessBoard board)
      Returns set containing all squares that given player's pieces can move to on given board.
      Set<Square> squaresThreatenedByPlayer(Player player, ChessBoard board)
      Returns set containing all squares that given player's pieces threaten on given board.
      Set<Square> threatenedSquares(Piece piece, ChessBoard board)
      Uses corresponding mover to returns a set containing all squares given piece threatens on given board.

    • Method Detail

      • threatenedSquares

        public Set<Square> threatenedSquares(Piece piece,
                                     ChessBoard board)
        Uses corresponding mover to returns a set containing all squares given piece threatens on given board.
        Parameters:
        piece - piece of which threatened squares are being checked
        board - board on which piece is placed
        Returns:
        a set containing all squares given piece threatens on given board

        Parameters:

        board - board on which piece is placed
        Returns:
        a set containing all squares given piece can move to on given board

      • move

        public void move(Piece piece,
                 Square target,
                 ChessBoard board)
        Uses corresponding PieceMover to move given piece to target square on given board.
        Parameters:
        piece - piece to be moved
        target - square where piece will be moved to
        board - board on which movement happens

      • squaresThreatenedByPlayer

        public Set<Square> squaresThreatenedByPlayer(Player player,
                                             ChessBoard board)
        Returns set containing all squares that given player's pieces threaten on given board.
        Parameters:
        player - given player
        board - given chessboard
        Returns:
        set containing all squares that given player's pieces threaten
